        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getParticipants()
                                                throws JoynServiceException

                      throws JoynServiceException
        Transfers a file to participants. The parameter filename contains the complete path of the file to be transferred.
        Parameters:
        filename - Filename to transfer
        fileicon - Filename of the file icon associated to the file to be transfered

        File transfer

        JoynServiceException

        public void sendIsComposingEvent(boolean status)

        Parameters:

      • getMaxParticipants

        public int getMaxParticipants()
                       throws JoynServiceException
        Returns the max number of participants in the group chat. This limit is read during the conference event subscription and overrides the provisioning parameter.
        Returns:
        Number
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException

      • quitConversation

        public void quitConversation()
                      throws JoynServiceException
        Quits a group chat conversation. The conversation will continue between other participants if there are enough participants.
        Throws:
        JoynServiceException
